TATOO ARTIST

WHO WE ARE

CUT-IT is a next generation hair and beauty booking app integrated with its very own social media platform - providing an inclusive space for people to define their looks, master their craft and gain recognition.

THE CUT-IT TEAM

Features

The social app for looking good & feeling good!

Bookings and appointments

Seamlessly manage upcoming appointments, set your cancellation policy and reschedule bookings with the click of a button. An interactive calendar gives you full control over appointment management - no need to waste time entering booking information.

Cashless payments

No fumbling for cash as you can book and pay directly though the app. We offer Tipping with zero fees taken meaning you can show support to your favourite specialist.

Connect with specialist, clients and friends

The social media features of our app allow you to define your look, research your next specialist and connect with the people you find inspiring. The inspiration feed will provide you with a stream of new ideas for your next look, and specialists can easily be identified with their unique symbols next to their username.

Find the best hair & beauty specialists

CUT-IT uses verified client- based reviews which solves the problem of not knowing the skill and quality of a given individual before you pay them for a service. This helps to put your mind at ease and know that your needs can be catered for.

Grow your business!s & build your following

With access to all of your target market in one place, the possibilities for growth are endless. As a specialist, you can share your craft to all users on the app, building up a following and strengthening your brand. Users can define their look and inspire other people to follow them for new styles.

WHY CHOOSE US?

The social app for looking good & feeling good!

User

Discover stlyes

Discover the latest trends in hair and beauty, pick up new tips and tricks. Get inspired, get creative, discover new ways to express your style. #Defineyourlook

Book appointments

Hair and beauty appointments can be easily booked in 3-5 clicks via Apple/Google pay.

Search by Specialist or services in your area. Specialist profiles are displayed based on verified user reviews, helping you to easily make your decision.

Review & tip your specialist

For the specialists who go the extra mile; a good review or a tip is an easy way to say thank you.Tips go directly to them and reviews go a long way in helping others choose their specialist. People trust people.

Connect with other users & specialists

You can quickly save user posts that have inspired you, sending them to your specialist prior to your booking. Stay in touch with other users using our built in chat feature.

Specialist

Grow your business

Good reviews increase your position on the Specialist Hub, this means more visibility for your business.

Build up your following to reach more potential clients.

Organise bookings & payments

Our powerful free booking software allows you to manage your business all in one place. No need for multiple apps.

Secure payments

Accepting payments doesn’t need to be stressful. All payments for bookings are done via the app and are securely handled by Stripe. Payouts go directly to your bank account every 7 days.

Optimise performance

With business Insights on all features it's now easier than ever to optimise your performance and take your business to new heights.

HOW TO GET STARTED

Find out how to get started using our app in a few easy steps!

Download

Coming soon to iOS and Android.

Signup

Register for a free account to begin using CUT-IT.

Post

Upload pictures and videos of your new style and Define Your Look. Friends and followers can like, share or comment on your post.

Pick your specialist

Browse profiles, read reviews and have conversations with specialists in your area and book with peace of mind.

Become a specialist

Any user can seamlessly become a Specialist and create a virtual store; managing their bookings and building an audience. Only one app is needed for both users and specialists.

Book and pay

Easily book, re-book & tip your specialists directly through our app, in a few clicks.

Receive exclusive offers such as £5 off your first haircut, full-face or set of nails & more right now!

Available on Android.

Google Play

Available on iOS.

App Store

Frequently asked questions

USER

FAQ TITLE

Clients can register on the app free of charge. They can find barbers, hairdressers, nail techs, makeup artists and more near them with no subscription. A 5% commission is applied on bookings.
